briefdescription.para: Initializes a new instance of this class that can be used to save a document in the Xps format.
Initializes a new instance of this class that can be used to save a document in the Xps or OpenXps format.

detaileddescription.para: Note that ExpandedOutlineLevels option will not work when saving to XPS.

briefdescription.para: Specifies the format in which the document will be saved if this save options object is used. Can only be Xps.
Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the document should be saved using a booklet printing layout, if it is specified via MultiplePages.

detaileddescription.para: If this option is specified, PageSet is ignored when saving. This behavior matches MS Word. If book fold printing settings are not specified in page setup, this option will have no effect.

briefdescription.para: Can be used to specify additional options when saving a document into the Xps format.
